content:
In #user community > search topics , we discussed implementing a keyboard shortcut for topic search inside "more topics", and there's an open PR (#18823). It uses Q, same as stream name search when you are not inside more topics.

Do folks think this is worth doing? Opening "more topics" immediately places your cursor into the search box, but I don't see a handy way to get back to it if you navigate away, e.g. if you got to a topic and decide it's not the one you were looking for. CC @Purushottam Tiwari
I think that proposal makes sense to me! I don't think there's an obvious UI thing we can do with Q in that state otherwise.
Cool, in that case @Purushottam Tiwari , could you rebase #18823?

Rebased #18823.
We have some discussion as well some questions based on current state of the PR at #design > topic filter .

Purushottam Tiwari said:

What should be the behavior for Q hotkey when left sidebar is a sidebar popover(opened using hamburger icon in top left) in small screen? Should we open the left sidebar and show zoom topic view for highlighted stream?

I think the right behavior should be that we open the left sidebar and then show the zoom element, yeah.
